<MethodEndpoint

</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the current two-factor authentication settings.

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"TFA settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"The ID of the TFA configuration.","nullable":true,"example":"9846"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"The display name or description of the TFA configuration.","nullable":true,"example":"legacy_1080p_small_wooden_mouse"},"enabled":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the TFA configuration is currently active.","example":true},"avaliable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the TFA configuration can be used.","example":true},"trustedIps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The list of IP addresses that are exempt from TFA requirements.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"mandatoryUsers":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The list of user IDs that are required to use TFA.","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]},"mandatoryGroups":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The list of group IDs whose members are required to use TFA.","nullable":true,"example":["75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The parameters representing the Two-Factor Authentication (TFA) configuration settings.","title":"TfaSettingsDto"}},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"TfaSettingsArrayWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
